search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pointerpro (pointerpro.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Pointerpro is: [https://pointerpro.com/en/pricing/](https://pointerpro.com/en/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
yearly (save 2 months)

#### DistributR

#### **On request**

15000+ monthly responses

Maximize distribution and monetization of assessments and reports with the [Distribution Portal](https://pointerpro.com/distribution-portal)

ReportR features plus:
----------------------

*   ![Image 1: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Distribution Portal to leverage assessment distribution
    
*   ![Image 2: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Respondent base feeding by customers/co-workers
    
*   ![Image 3: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Respondent invitation templates with unique links
    
    You create the templates for customers/co-workers. Unique respondent links are generated. Real-time response collection and result view
*   ![Image 4: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Real-time response collection and result view
    
    Your customers/co-workers collect responses. You view overall results.
*   ![Image 5: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Email campaign template creation
    
    Created by your customers/co-workers
*   ![Image 6: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Optional: charge for assessment/report access
    
*   ![Image 7: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Overview of to-do assessments for respondents
    
*   ![Image 8: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Overview of responses and reports for respondents
    
*   ![Image 9: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Dashboard Builder
    
*   ![Image 10: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Multiple users and team management (on request)
    
*   ![Image 11: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Aggregate Reports (on request)
    

![Image 12: Recommended](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/themes/project-child/assets/img/svg/recommended_badge.svg)

#### ReportR

#### **On request**

10000+ monthly responses

The only plan to build questionnaires and [personalized PDF reports](https://pointerpro.com/pdf-report-builder/)

Enterprise features plus:
-------------------------

*   ![Image 13: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Drag & drop PDF report builder with preview

Professional features plus:

    Questionnaire campaigns (on request)

*   ![Image 33: bullet orange 150x150 1](https://proweb.p.blends.be/wp-content/uploads/bullet-orange-150x150-1.png)Dashboard Builder (on request)

Additional services

#### Professional Services  

Questionnaire & PDF report template building by Pointerpro experts. The price is estimated based on length and complexity of the report lay-out.

![Image 93](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/Group-1000002719.jpg)

Additional services

#### Integration  

Integrations include Zapier, Make (formerly Integromat), API endpoints, and Webhooks.

![Image 94](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/pricing_2.jpg)

We're ISO 27001:2022 certified!

#### You are in safe hands

ISO 27001 certification assures our customers of a steadfast commitment to maintaining the highest standards of information security and safeguarding their valuable data.

This certification underscores Pointerpro’s dedication to meeting global benchmarks and instilling confidence and trust in the reliability and security of its services.

![Image 95](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/BC-Certified-logo_ISO-27001-2022-RVA_ENG-1.jpg)

Your Onboarding Journey
-----------------------

Our team of experts will walk you through the ideal journey to build your perfect assessment and report. Whether you have it ready or are in the process of figuring it out and have decided to create it directly on Pointerpro.

Our goal is to make you self-sufficient so you can create and edit without our assistance. But if you do, we will be there.

They will ensure you understand Pointerpro’s capabilities. They will also assist before, during, and after you go live to further explore other use cases that expand the impact of Pointerpro within your organization.

![Image 96](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/Keila-website-onboarding-2.png)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

The number of responses we take into account equals the number of people that completed one of your questionnaires. Depending on your plan, you have access to a set number of responses per month. No worries, we store all the responses you collect, so if you exceed your monthly limit, you can always upgrade to a higher plan to view all your responses.

Absolutely. Pointerpro offers maximum flexibility: if you expect more than 20 responses in a month, you can start with a paid plan that suits your expected number of responses. Afterwards, you can simply downgrade to the free plan. You can upgrade again to a paying paid plan again at any time. We don’t delete any surveys or responses when you downgrade to the free plan.

Subscription plans are billed from the date you begin your subscription. Invoices are available and printable by accessing your account.

We can help with different kinds of services including survey design, special question types or widgets, tailor-made reports and integrations. For more information, send us an email: [info@pointerpro.com](mailto:info@pointerpro.com)

Every first day of the month we reset the counters for your responses and emails.

We accept Visa, MasterCard and American Express through our online payment system. For annual plans, we are able to send invoices based on a P.O. (Purchase Order) and we accept bank transfer payments. Please contact us and we’ll have this set up for you.

Yes, we have to add Value Added Tax (VAT) to all European Union clients without VAT number and all clients based in Belgium. Customers outside the EU are exempt from VAT.

Why choose Pointerpro?
----------------------

“We use Pointerpro for all types of surveys and assessments across  
our global business and employees love its ease of use and flexible  
reporting.”​

Jim McLean  
Director at Alere

![Image 94](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/pricing_2.jpg)

We're ISO 27001:2022 certified!

#### You are in safe hands

ISO 27001 certification assures our customers of a steadfast commitment to maintaining the highest standards of information security and safeguarding their valuable data.

This certification underscores Pointerpro’s dedication to meeting global benchmarks and instilling confidence and trust in the reliability and security of its services.

![Image 95](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/BC-Certified-logo_ISO-27001-2022-RVA_ENG-1.jpg)

Your Onboarding Journey
-----------------------

Our team of experts will walk you through the ideal journey to build your perfect assessment and report. Whether you have it ready or are in the process of figuring it out and have decided to create it directly on Pointerpro.

Our goal is to make you self-sufficient so you can create and edit without our assistance. But if you do, we will be there.

They will ensure you understand Pointerpro’s capabilities. They will also assist before, during, and after you go live to further explore other use cases that expand the impact of Pointerpro within your organization.

![Image 96](https://pointerpro.com/wp-content/uploads/Keila-website-onboarding-2.png)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

The number of responses we take into account equals the number of people that completed one of your questionnaires. Depending on your plan, you have access to a set number of responses per month. No worries, we store all the responses you collect, so if you exceed your monthly limit, you can always upgrade to a higher plan to view all your responses.

Absolutely. Pointerpro offers maximum flexibility: if you expect more than 20 responses in a month, you can start with a paid plan that suits your expected number of responses. Afterwards, you can simply downgrade to the free plan. You can upgrade again to a paying paid plan again at any time. We don’t delete any surveys or responses when you downgrade to the free plan.

Subscription plans are billed from the date you begin your subscription. Invoices are available and printable by accessing your account.

We can help with different kinds of services including survey design, special question types or widgets, tailor-made reports and integrations. For more information, send us an email: [info@pointerpro.com](mailto:info@pointerpro.com)

Every first day of the month we reset the counters for your responses and emails.

We accept Visa, MasterCard and American Express through our online payment system. For annual plans, we are able to send invoices based on a P.O. (Purchase Order) and we accept bank transfer payments. Please contact us and we’ll have this set up for you.

Yes, we have to add Value Added Tax (VAT) to all European Union clients without VAT number and all clients based in Belgium. Customers outside the EU are exempt from VAT.

Why choose Pointerpro?
----------------------

“We use Pointerpro for all types of surveys and assessments across  
our global business and employees love its ease of use and flexible  
reporting.”​

Jim McLean  
Director at Alere
